title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan2 - What You Didn't Hear About Lunchbox Getting Free Donuts for St. Patrick's Day (Week of 3/22)
itunes:title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan2 - What You Didn't Hear About Lunchbox Getting Free Donuts for St. Patrick's Day (Week of 3/22)
description:
This edition of the podcast features behind the scenes from show members and moments that happened after we turned off the microphones. Morgan2 brings on Lunchbox to talk about how he went to Krispy Kreme for Saint Patrick's Day to get free donuts by changing outfits. He explains how it was much harder to do than you think.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
